					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = coptic_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								superregion = persia_superregion
							}
							AND = {
								continent = indian_continent
								OR = {
									superregion = west_india_superregion
									superregion = north_india_superregion
									superregion = rajputana_superregion
									superregion = east_india_superregion
									superregion = central_india_superregion
									superregion = south_india_superregion
								}
							}
							religion_group = muslim
							religion_group = dharmic
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = jewish_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = sikh_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = sunni_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = shia_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = hinduism_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						religion_group = christian

				}

					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					25 = {

					}

				set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
			}

		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				33 = {
					set_country_flag = theologian_flag
				}
				33 = {
					set_country_flag = artist_flag
				}
				33 = {
					set_country_flag = philosopher_flag
				}
			}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA736"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_years_of_income = 0.25
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB736"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_country_flag
			theologian_flag = {
				set_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								monthly_income = 15
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_country_flag
							state_religion_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = theologian
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
							jewish_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = natural_scientist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = protestant
										}
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = reformed
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = reformed
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic

										type = natural_scientist

										religion = orthodox

										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}

										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist

										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}

								else = {

							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 2
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 2
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}

										religion = protestant

									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 2
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}

									limit = {

										type = natural_scientist

								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = protestant
										}
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = reformed
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = reformed
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							heathen_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian
										capital_scope = {
											continent = europe
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian
										capital_scope = {
											OR = {
												continent = mena
												continent = central_asia
												continent = indian_continent
											}
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = sunni
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian
										capital_scope = {
											continent = sub_sahara
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = sunni
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = muslim
										capital_scope = {
											OR = {
												region = greece_region
												region = east_balkan_region
												region = central_balkan_region
											}
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = muslim
										capital_scope = {
											continent = europe
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = muslim
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = natural_scientist
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {

										type = natural_scientist

			artist_flag = {
				set_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								monthly_income = 15
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_country_flag
							state_religion_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
							jewish_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}

										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}

								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = protestant
										}
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 1

								else_if = {
									limit = {

										}

										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes

										type = artist
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}

								if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian

									define_advisor = {
										type = artist

								}
							}
							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 2
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic

											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = artist

									define_advisor = {
										type = artist
										skill = 3
										religion = zoroastrian
										discount = yes

									limit = {

										type = artist

										religion = hinduism

				}
				else = {
					trigger_switch = {
						on_trigger = has_country_flag
						state_religion_advisor = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
							}
						}
						jewish_advisor = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										religion = catholic
										religion = reformed
									}
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = protestant
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									NOT = {
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = protestant
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = catholic
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = orthodox
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = coptic
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = coptic
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							else = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
						}
						reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										religion = catholic
										religion = protestant
									}
									is_religion_enabled = reformed
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = reformed
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									NOT = {
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1

									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes

									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
						}
						heathen_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = christian
									capital_scope = {
										continent = europe
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = christian
									capital_scope = {
										OR = {
											continent = mena
											continent = central_asia
											continent = indian_continent

									}

								define_advisor = {
									type = artist
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = sunni
								}
							}

									skill = 1

									religion = sunni
								}

									capital_scope = {
										OR = {
											region = greece_region

					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
			}
			philosopher_flag = {
				set_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								monthly_income = 15
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_country_flag
							state_religion_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
							jewish_advisor = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = protestant
										}
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = reformed
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = reformed
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = reformed
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = orthodox
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = coptic
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = coptic
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							heathen_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian
										capital_scope = {
											continent = europe
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = jewish
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian
										capital_scope = {
											OR = {
												continent = mena
												continent = central_asia
												continent = indian_continent
											}
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = sunni
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = christian

										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = sunni
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = muslim
										capital_scope = {
											OR = {
												region = greece_region
												region = east_balkan_region
												region = central_balkan_region
											}
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion_group = muslim
										capital_scope = {
											continent = europe
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 1
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic
									}
								}

									limit = {

							protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										OR = {
											religion = catholic
											religion = reformed
										}
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = protestant
									}
								}
								else_if = {
									limit = {
										religion = catholic
										NOT = {
											is_religion_enabled = protestant
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = orthodox
									}
								}
								else_if = {

										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										discount = yes
										religion = catholic

									limit = {

										discount = yes
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										religion = nahuatl
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							nahuatl_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											religion = nahuatl
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										religion = nahuatl
										discount = yes
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										religion = mesoamerican_religion
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
							inca_advisor = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											religion = inti
										}
									}
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										religion = inti
										discount = yes
									}
								}
								else = {
									define_advisor = {
										type = philosopher
										skill = 3
										religion = animism
										discount = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					trigger_switch = {
						on_trigger = has_country_flag
						state_religion_advisor = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
							}
						}
						jewish_advisor = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										religion = catholic
										religion = reformed
									}
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = protestant
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									NOT = {
										is_religion_enabled = protestant
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = protestant
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = catholic
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = orthodox
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = coptic
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = coptic
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							else = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
						}
						reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										religion = catholic
										religion = protestant
									}
									is_religion_enabled = reformed
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = reformed
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									NOT = {
										is_religion_enabled = reformed
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = orthodox
								}

									religion = reformed

									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = catholic
								}

									religion = orthodox

								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = coptic
								}

							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion = coptic
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
							else = {
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
						}
						heathen_advisor = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = christian
									capital_scope = {
										continent = europe
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = jewish
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = christian
									capital_scope = {
										OR = {
											continent = mena
											continent = central_asia
											continent = indian_continent
										}
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = sunni
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = christian
									capital_scope = {
										continent = sub_sahara
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = sunni
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = muslim
									capital_scope = {
										OR = {
											region = greece_region
											region = east_balkan_region
											region = central_balkan_region
										}
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = orthodox
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = muslim
									capital_scope = {
										continent = europe
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = catholic
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									religion_group = muslim
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
									religion = coptic
								}
							}

							}

									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									discount = yes
								}
							}
						}

						}

							if = {
								limit = {
									any_province = {
										religion = catholic
										has_discovered = ROOT
									}
								}
								define_advisor = {
									type = philosopher
									skill = 1
									religion = catholic
									discount = yes
								}
							}
							else = {

							}
						}

				clr_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
			}
		}
		add_prestige = 10
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.736.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ruler_has_personality = zealot_personality
				ruler_has_personality = tolerant_personality
			}
			monthly_income = 16
		}
		required_personality = zealot_personality
		required_personality = tolerant_personality
		add_prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						monthly_income = 15
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag
					state_religion_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = theologian
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					jewish_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {

									religion = catholic

							}

								skill = 2
								religion = totemism
								discount = yes
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 2
								religion = animism
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					mayan_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = mesoamerican_religion
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 2
								religion = mesoamerican_religion

			else = {
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag
					state_religion_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = theologian
							skill = 3
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					jewish_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {

						if = {
							limit = {

							define_advisor = {

								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					heathen_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									continent = europe
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									OR = {
										continent = mena
										continent = central_asia
										continent = indian_continent
									}
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = sunni
							}
						}

							limit = {

							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3

							}

							limit = {
								religion_group = muslim
								capital_scope = {
									OR = {
										region = greece_region

								type = artist

	option = {
		name = "personality_options.736.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ruler_has_personality = free_thinker_personality
				ruler_has_personality = well_advised_personality
			}
			monthly_income = 16
		}
		required_personality = free_thinker_personality
		required_personality = well_advised_personality
		add_prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						monthly_income = 15
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag
					state_religion_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					jewish_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = catholic
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {

							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 1

								religion = animism

								NOT = {

								}

					on_trigger = has_country_flag

					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 2
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 2
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}

					heathen_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									continent = europe
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 2
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									OR = {
										continent = mena

						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = dharmic
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = adi_dharam
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = philosopher
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}

						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = zoroastrian
								}

								skill = 3
								religion = hinduism
								discount = yes

						}

							limit = {
								is_religion_enabled = sikhism

		else = {
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_country_flag
				state_religion_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = philosopher
						skill = 0
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				jewish_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = philosopher
						skill = 0
						discount = yes
						religion = jewish
					}
				}
				protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = reformed
							}
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = protestant
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
							}
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = reformed
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0

							religion = orthodox

						limit = {
							religion = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic

					else_if = {

							religion = orthodox
						}

							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic

					if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								continent = europe
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							discount = yes

							skill = 0
							religion = nahuatl
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				inca_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = inti
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							religion = inti
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = philosopher
							skill = 0
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
	}
	after = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_country_flag
			state_religion_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
			}
			jewish_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = jewish_advisor
			}
			protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = protestant_or_coptic_advisor
			}
			reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = reformed_or_orthodox_advisor
			}
			heathen_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = heathen_advisor
			}
			zoroastrian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
			}
			sikh_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sikh_advisor
			}
			confucian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = confucian_advisor
			}
			shinto_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shinto_advisor
			}
			theravada_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = theravada_advisor
			}
			mahayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mahayana_advisor
			}
			vajrayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = vajrayana_advisor
			}
			catholic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = catholic_advisor
			}
			hinduism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = hinduism_advisor
			}
			ibadi_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
			}
			shia_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shia_advisor
			}
			sunni_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sunni_advisor
			}
			coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = coptic_advisor
			}
			norse_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = norse_advisor
			}
			animism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = animism_advisor
			}
			totemism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = totemism_advisor
			}
			inca_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = inca_advisor
			}
			nahuatl_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = nahuatl_advisor
			}
			mayan_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mayan_advisor
			}
		}
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_country_flag
			theologian_flag = {
				clr_country_flag = theologian_flag
			}
			artist_flag = {
				clr_country_flag = artist_flag
			}
			philosopher_flag = {
				clr_country_flag = philosopher_flag
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = random_event.737
	title = "EVTNAME737"
	desc = "EVTDESC737"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		num_of_cities = 2
		any_owned_province = {
			is_overseas = no
			is_capital = no
			fort_level = 1
			NOT = {
				has_province_modifier = "local_fortress"
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					is_overseas = no
					is_capital = no
					fort_level = 1
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = "local_fortress"
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = local_fortification_expert_province
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA737"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				advisor = fortification_expert
			}
		}
		define_advisor = {
			type = fortification_expert
			skill = 2
			culture = event_target:local_fortification_expert_province
			religion = event_target:local_fortification_expert_province
			discount = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB737"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
		}
		event_target:local_fortification_expert_province = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = "local_fortress"
				duration = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.737.b"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = well_connected_personality
		}
		required_personality = well_connected_personality
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		define_advisor = {
			type = fortification_expert
			culture = event_target:local_fortification_expert_province
			religion = event_target:local_fortification_expert_province
			discount = yes
			skill = 3
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = random_event.854
	title = "EVTNAME854"
	desc = "EVTDESC854"
	picture = IMPORTANT_STATUE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		stability = 1
		prestige = 50
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						continent = europe
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = jewish_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = protestant_or_coptic_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = reformed_or_orthodox_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								continent = sub_sahara
								OR = {
									region = west_africa_region
									region = mali_region
									region = volta_region
									region = manding_region
									region = central_africa_region
									region = gulf_of_nigeria_region
									region = coastal_kongo_region
									region = inland_kongo_region
								}
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									AND = {
										superregion = north_africa_superregion
										NOT = {
											region = east_sahara_region
										}
										NOT = {
											area = western_sahara_area
										}
										NOT = {
											area = arguin_area
										}
									}
									region = egypt_region
								}
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									superregion = near_east_superregion
									superregion = anatolia_superregion
								}
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									superregion = east_africa_superregion
									superregion = west_africa_superregion
									superregion = north_africa_superregion
									region = egypt_region
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = jewish_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = sunni_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = shia_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = coptic_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								superregion = persia_superregion
							}
							AND = {
								continent = indian_continent
								OR = {
									superregion = west_india_superregion
									superregion = north_india_superregion
									superregion = rajputana_superregion
									superregion = east_india_superregion
									superregion = central_india_superregion
									superregion = south_india_superregion
								}
							}
							religion_group = muslim
							religion_group = dharmic
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = jewish_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = sikh_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = sunni_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = shia_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = hinduism_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						religion_group = christian
					}
					NOT = {
						religion_group = muslim
					}
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							continent = east_asia
							continent = southeast_asia
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = confucian_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = shinto_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = theravada_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = mahayana_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = vajrayana_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = catholic_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							continent = new_world
							continent = north_america
							continent = south_america
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = norse_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = totemism_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = animism_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = mayan_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = inca_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = nahuatl_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					religion_group = christian
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = jewish_advisor
					}
					75 = {
						set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = protestant_or_coptic_advisor
					}
					25 = {
						set_country_flag = reformed_or_orthodox_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = heathen_advisor
					}
					10 = {
						set_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA854"
		set_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						monthly_income = 15
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag
					state_religion_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					jewish_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = catholic
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = orthodox
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = coptic
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = coptic
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = protestant
								}
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = reformed
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = reformed
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = reformed
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = catholic
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = orthodox
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = coptic
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = coptic
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					heathen_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									continent = europe
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									OR = {
										continent = mena
										continent = central_asia
										continent = indian_continent
									}
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 1
								discount = yes
								religion = sunni
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian

								}
							}
							define_advisor = {

							define_advisor = {

						}
					}
					mayan_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = mesoamerican_religion
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
								discount = yes
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = nahuatl
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					nahuatl_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = nahuatl
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = nahuatl
								discount = yes
							}
						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					inca_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = inti
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = inti

								type = artist
								skill = 3
								religion = animism
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_country_flag
				state_religion_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 2
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				jewish_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 2
						discount = yes
						religion = jewish
					}
				}
				protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = reformed
							}
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = protestant
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic
						}
					}

							religion = orthodox
						}

							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic
						}
					}

						limit = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
							}
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = reformed
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic

						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2

						define_advisor = {

							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				heathen_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								continent = europe
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								OR = {
									continent = mena
									continent = central_asia
									continent = indian_continent
								}
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = sunni
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {

							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = sunni
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
							capital_scope = {
								OR = {
									region = greece_region
									region = east_balkan_region
									region = central_balkan_region
								}
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 2
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox

							type = artist
							skill = 2

		name = "personality_options.854.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = well_connected_personality
		}

		add_prestige = 5
		set_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = yes_scaled_skill_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						monthly_income = 15
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag
					state_religion_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 1

						}
					}

						}

						if = {

						}
						else = {
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 2
								religion = nahuatl
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					nahuatl_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									religion = nahuatl
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 2
								religion = nahuatl
								discount = yes
							}

								type = artist
								skill = 2
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
								discount = yes
							}
						}

								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}

			else = {
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_country_flag

						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							discount = yes

							discount = yes
							religion = jewish

						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}

						else_if = {

								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}
					heathen_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									continent = europe
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = jewish
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion_group = christian
								capital_scope = {
									OR = {
										continent = mena
										continent = central_asia
										continent = indian_continent

							define_advisor = {
								type = artist
								skill = 3
								discount = yes

							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				sikh_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = sikhism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							is_religion_enabled = sikhism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = sikhism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = hinduism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = zoroastrian
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				confucian_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 3
						religion = confucianism
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				shinto_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 3
						religion = shinto
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				theravada_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 3
						religion = buddhism
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				mahayana_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 3
						religion = mahayana
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				vajrayana_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = artist
						skill = 3
						religion = vajrayana
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				catholic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								religion = catholic
								has_discovered = ROOT
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = catholic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				hinduism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = hinduism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = sunni
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				ibadi_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = ibadi
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = ibadi
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				shia_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = shiite
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = ibadi
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				sunni_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = sunni
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = sunni
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				coptic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = coptic
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = coptic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = gnostic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				norse_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = norse_pagan_reformed
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = norse_pagan_reformed
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				animism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = animism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				totemism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = totemism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				mayan_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = nahuatl
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				nahuatl_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = nahuatl
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = nahuatl
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				inca_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = inti
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = inti
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = artist
							skill = 3
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
	}
	after = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_country_flag
			state_religion_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
			}
			jewish_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = jewish_advisor
			}
			protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = protestant_or_coptic_advisor
			}
			reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = reformed_or_orthodox_advisor
			}
			heathen_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = heathen_advisor
			}
			zoroastrian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
			}
			sikh_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sikh_advisor
			}
			confucian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = confucian_advisor
			}
			shinto_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shinto_advisor
			}
			theravada_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = theravada_advisor
			}
			mahayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mahayana_advisor
			}
			vajrayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = vajrayana_advisor
			}
			catholic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = catholic_advisor
			}
			hinduism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = hinduism_advisor
			}
			ibadi_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
			}
			shia_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shia_advisor
			}
			sunni_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sunni_advisor
			}
			coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = coptic_advisor
			}
			norse_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = norse_advisor
			}
			animism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = animism_advisor
			}
			totemism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = totemism_advisor
			}
			inca_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = inca_advisor
			}
			nahuatl_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = nahuatl_advisor
			}
			mayan_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mayan_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = random_event.855
	title = "EVTNAME855"
	desc = "EVTDESC855"
	picture = IMPORTANT_STATUE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_at_war = yes
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA855"
		random_list = {
			30 = {}
			40 = {
				custom_tooltip = stability_points_lost_50
				hidden_effect = {
					subtract_variable = {
						which = stability_points
						value = 50
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = stability_points
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						add_stability = -1
						country_event = {
							id = POP_Stability.003
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_emperor_of_china = yes
							}
							add_mandate = -5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			30 = {
				add_stability = -1
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = POP_Stability.003
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.855.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = strict_personality
		}
		required_personality = strict_personality
		add_prestige = -5
	}
}

	id = random_event.862

country_event = {
	id = random_event.863
	title = "EVTNAME863"
	desc = "EVTDESC863"
	picture = MERCHANTS_TALKING_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		num_of_merchants = 2
		capital_scope = {
			continent = europe
		}
		any_active_trade_node = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = southeast_asia
					continent = indian_continent
					continent = east_asia
					continent = central_asia
					continent = north_asia
				}
			}
			has_merchant = PREV
			NOT = {
				has_trade_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					name = merchant_recalled
				}
			}
		}
		any_active_trade_node = {
			continent = europe
			has_merchant = PREV
			NOT = {
				has_trade_modifier = {
					who = ROOT
					name = merchant_recalled
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = burghers_loyalty_added_a
				value = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA863"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
		}
		trigger = {
			any_active_trade_node = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						continent = southeast_asia
						continent = indian_continent
						continent = east_asia
						continent = central_asia
						continent = north_asia
					}
				}
				has_merchant = PREV
				NOT = {
					has_trade_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						name = merchant_recalled
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_active_trade_node = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						continent = southeast_asia
						continent = indian_continent
						continent = east_asia
						continent = central_asia
						continent = north_asia
					}
				}
				has_merchant = PREV
				NOT = {
					has_trade_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						name = merchant_recalled
					}
				}
			}
			add_trade_modifier = {
				who = root
				duration = 3650
				power = -10
				key = merchant_recalled
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB863"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
		}
		trigger = {
			any_active_trade_node = {
				continent = europe
				has_merchant = PREV
				NOT = {
					has_trade_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						name = merchant_recalled
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_active_trade_node = {
			limit = {
				continent = europe
				has_merchant = PREV
				NOT = {
					has_trade_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						name = merchant_recalled
					}
				}
			}
			add_trade_modifier = {
				who = root
				duration = 3650
				power = -10
				key = merchant_recalled
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC863"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				check_variable = {
					which = estate_burghers_weight_share
					value = 0.01
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = estate_burghers_weight_share
					value = 0.01
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = estate_burghers_loyalty_added_a
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = burghers_loyalty_added
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = burghers_loyalty_added
					which = burghers_loyalty_added_a
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 64
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers

country_event = {
	id = random_event.864
	title = "EVTNAME864"
	desc = "EVTDESC864"
	picture = COURT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		any_neighbor_country = {
			religion = ROOT
			NOT = {
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				truce_with = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA864"
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_improved_relations
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.864.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = charismatic_negotiator_personality
		}
		required_personality = charismatic_negotiator_personality
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = ROOT
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					truce_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_improved_relations
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_improved_relations
			}
		}
		random_known_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_improved_relations
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = random_event.865
	title = "EVTNAME865"
	desc = "EVTDESC865"
	picture = POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		religion = catholic
		NOT = {
			tag = PAP
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA865"
		add_papal_influence = 10
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB865"
		add_prestige = 5
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.865.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = pious_personality
		}
		required_personality = pious_personality
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_papal_influence = 15
	}
}

	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB867"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		add_dip_power = 10
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.867.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = scholar_personality
		}
		required_personality = scholar_personality
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_corruption = 1
		add_dip_power = 120
	}
}
