					jewish_advisor = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 3
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									religion = catholic
									religion = reformed
								}
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = grand_captain
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = protestant
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = catholic
								NOT = {
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = grand_captain
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = orthodox
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								religion = protestant
							}
							define_advisor = {
								type = grand_captain
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
								religion = catholic

							limit = {
								religion = orthodox

								type = grand_captain

							define_advisor = {
								type = grand_captain
								skill = 3
								discount = yes
							}
						}
					}

						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {

				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_country_flag
				state_religion_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				jewish_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						discount = yes
						religion = jewish
					}
				}
				protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = reformed
							}
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = protestant
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = protestant
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
							}
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = reformed
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = catholic
							NOT = {
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = reformed
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = orthodox
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = coptic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				heathen_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								continent = europe
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = jewish
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								OR = {
									continent = mena
									continent = central_asia
									continent = indian_continent
								}
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = sunni
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = christian
							capital_scope = {
								continent = sub_sahara
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = sunni
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
							capital_scope = {
								OR = {
									region = greece_region
									region = east_balkan_region
									region = central_balkan_region
								}
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = orthodox
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
							capital_scope = {
								continent = europe
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = coptic
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = taoic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = animism
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = dharmic
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
							religion = adi_dharam
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				zoroastrian_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = zoroastrian
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = zoroastrian
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				sikh_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							religion = sikhism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							is_religion_enabled = sikhism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = sikhism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion = hinduism
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = zoroastrian
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							religion_group = muslim
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = hinduism

					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain

				}

						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						religion = confucianism
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				shinto_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						religion = shinto
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				theravada_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						religion = buddhism
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				mahayana_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						religion = mahayana
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				vajrayana_advisor = {
					define_advisor = {
						type = grand_captain
						skill = 1
						religion = vajrayana
						discount = yes
					}
				}
				catholic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								religion = catholic
								has_discovered = ROOT
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = catholic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				hinduism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = hinduism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = hinduism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = sunni
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				ibadi_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = ibadi
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = ibadi
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				shia_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = shiite
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = ibadi
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				sunni_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = sunni
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = sunni
							discount = yes

					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = shiite
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				coptic_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = coptic
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = coptic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = gnostic
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				norse_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = norse_pagan_reformed
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = norse_pagan_reformed
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				animism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = animism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				totemism_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = totemism
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = totemism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				mayan_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = mesoamerican_religion
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {

							skill = 1
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = nahuatl
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				nahuatl_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = nahuatl
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = nahuatl
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = mesoamerican_religion
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
				inca_advisor = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								religion = inti
							}
						}
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = inti
							discount = yes
						}
					}
					else = {
						define_advisor = {
							type = grand_captain
							skill = 1
							religion = animism
							discount = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = no_scaled_skill_flag
	}
	after = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_country_flag
			state_religion_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = state_religion_advisor
			}
			jewish_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = jewish_advisor
			}
			protestant_or_coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = protestant_or_coptic_advisor
			}
			reformed_or_orthodox_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = reformed_or_orthodox_advisor
			}
			heathen_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = heathen_advisor
			}
			zoroastrian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = zoroastrian_advisor
			}
			sikh_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sikh_advisor
			}
			confucian_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = confucian_advisor
			}
			shinto_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shinto_advisor
			}
			theravada_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = theravada_advisor
			}
			mahayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mahayana_advisor
			}
			vajrayana_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = vajrayana_advisor
			}
			catholic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = catholic_advisor
			}
			hinduism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = hinduism_advisor
			}
			ibadi_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = ibadi_advisor
			}
			shia_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = shia_advisor
			}
			sunni_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = sunni_advisor
			}
			coptic_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = coptic_advisor
			}
			norse_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = norse_advisor
			}
			animism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = animism_advisor
			}
			totemism_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = totemism_advisor
			}
			inca_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = inca_advisor
			}
			nahuatl_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = nahuatl_advisor
			}
			mayan_advisor = {
				clr_country_flag = mayan_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
namespace = random_event
country_event = {
	id = random_event.1
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME1"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC1"
	picture = LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_at_war = no
		treasury = 100
		any_known_country = {
			OR = {
				capital_scope = {
					continent = north_america
				}
				capital_scope = {
					continent = south_america
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					is_subject = no
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
				}
			}
			any_known_country = {
				war_with = PREV
				is_enemy = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA1"
		add_treasury = -100
		random_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					capital_scope = {
						continent = north_america
					}
					capital_scope = {
						continent = south_america
					}
				}
				any_known_country = {
					war_with = PREV
					is_enemy = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 100
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_sent_help
				years = 20
			}
		}
		random_rival_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					continent = europe
				}
				any_known_country = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = {
							continent = north_america
						}
						capital_scope = {
							continent = south_america
						}
					}
					war_with = PREV
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_interfered_in_war
				years = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB1"
		add_prestige = -5
		random_known_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					capital_scope = {
						continent = north_america
					}
					capital_scope = {
						continent = south_america
					}
				}
				any_known_country = {
					war_with = PREV
					is_enemy = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_refused_send_help
				years = 20
			}
		}
		random_rival_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					continent = europe
				}
				any_known_country = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = {
							continent = north_america
						}
						capital_scope = {
							continent = south_america
						}
					}
					war_with = PREV
				}
			}
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_pleased
				years = 20
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = random_event.2
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME2"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC2"
	picture = COLONIZATION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_colonial_nation = yes
		OR = {
			primary_culture = english
			primary_culture = northern_e
			primary_culture = lowland_scottish
		}
		any_owned_province = {
			continent = north_america
			OR = {
				culture = english
				culture = northern_e
				culture = lowland_scottish
			}
			is_capital = no
		}
		is_year = 1530
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA2"
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				continent = north_america
				OR = {
					culture = english
					culture = northern_e
					culture = lowland_scottish
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			area = {
				limit = {
					owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						culture = american
					}
				}
				change_culture = american
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = random_event.3
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME3"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC3"
	picture = COURT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_parliament = yes
		is_at_war = yes
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA3"
		trigger = {
			stability = -2
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = {
					stability = 1
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			30 = {}
			40 = {
				custom_tooltip = stability_points_lost_50
				hidden_effect = {
					subtract_variable = {
						which = stability_points
						value = 50
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = stability_points
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						add_stability = -1
						country_event = {
							id = POP_Stability.003
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_emperor_of_china = yes
							}
							add_mandate = -5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			30 = {
				add_stability = -1
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = POP_Stability.003
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB3"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_exhaustion = 8
			}
		}
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.random.3.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = secretive_personality
		}
		required_personality = secretive_personality
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_dip_power = -25
	}
}

		has_institution = enlightenment
		has_advisor = yes
		government = monarchy
		AND = {
			any_owned_province = {
				has_province_flag = university_present
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			any_owned_province = {
				has_province_modifier = football_modifier
			}
		}
		is_year = 1700
		technology_group = western
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			any_owned_province = {
				culture = english
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA4"
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
			}
			add_papal_influence = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				is_lesser_in_union = no
			}
			add_legitimacy = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				is_lesser_in_union = no
			}
			add_horde_unity = 10
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = english
					culture = northern_e
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = football_modifier
				duration = 18250
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB4"
		remove_advisor = random
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = random_event.8
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME8"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC8"
	picture = POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		religion = catholic
		NOT = {
			tag = PAP
		}
		OR = {
			advisor = natural_scientist
			advisor = philosopher
			advisor = artist
			advisor = theologian
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_owner_religion = yes
					has_building = temple
				}
				save_event_target_as = origin_of_bishop
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA8"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_saved_event_target = origin_of_bishop
			}
			define_advisor = {
				type = inquisitor
				skill = 1
				culture = event_target:origin_of_bishop
			}
		}
		else = {
			define_advisor = {
				type = inquisitor
				skill = 1
			}
		}
		add_papal_influence = 10
		if = {
			limit = {
				advisor = natural_scientist
			}
			kill_advisor = natural_scientist
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				advisor = philosopher
			}
			kill_advisor = philosopher
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				advisor = artist
			}
			kill_advisor = artist
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				advisor = theologian
			}
			kill_advisor = theologian
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB8"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_papal_influence = -20
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.random.8.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = pious_personality
		}
		required_personality = pious_personality
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
		add_papal_influence = -5
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = random_event.13
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME13"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC13"

	trigger = {
		owns = 385
		NOT = {
			has_country_modifier = mecca_timer
		}
		NOT = {
			has_ruler_modifier = pious_ruler
		}
		has_regency = no
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = mecca_timer
				duration = 1825
				hidden = yes
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = burghers_loyalty_added_a
				value = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA13"

			factor = 33

		add_treasury = 100
	}

		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB13"

			factor = 33

				factor = 2

					which = estate_burghers_weight_share
					value = 0.01
				}
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					which = estate_burghers_weight_share
					value = 0.01
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = estate_burghers_loyalty_added_a
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = burghers_loyalty_added
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = burghers_loyalty_added
					which = burghers_loyalty_added_a
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 64
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 64
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.64
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 64
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 32
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 32
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.32
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 32
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 16
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 16
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.16
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 16
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 8
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 8
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.08
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 8
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 4
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 4
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.04
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 4
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 2
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 2
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.02
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = burghers_loyalty_added
							value = 1
						}
					}
					add_estate_loyalty = {
						estate = estate_city_burghers
						loyalty = 1
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 0.01
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = burghers_loyalty_added
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = estate_burghers_loyalty
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						value = 1
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = burghers_control_province
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = estate_burghers_loyalty
							which = owner
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = EstateProv_UnrestSave
							which = EstateProv_Unrest
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = EstateProv_Unrest
							which = estate_burghers_loyalty
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = estate_burghers_loyalty
							value = 0
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = EstateProv_Unrest
									value = 0.6
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = loss
							subtract_variable = {
								which = EstateProv_Unrest
								value = 0.6
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = EstateProv_Unrest
										value = 0.401
									}
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = gain
							subtract_variable = {
								which = EstateProv_Unrest
								value = 0.4
							}
							multiply_variable = {

							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = EstateProv_Unrest_Inp
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = EstateProv_Unrest_Inp
									value = 0.1
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = EstateProv_UnrestLoss_0.1
										}
									}
									add_province_modifier = {
										name = EstateProv_UnrestLoss_0.1
										duration = -1
										hidden = yes
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = {
								limit = {
									has_province_modifier = EstateProv_UnrestLoss_0.1
								}
								remove_province_modifier = EstateProv_UnrestLoss_0.1
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = gain
							}
							clr_province_flag = gain
							multiply_variable = {
								which = EstateProv_Unrest
								value = 1
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = EstateProv_Unrest
								value = 0.1
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = EstateProv_Unrest
								value = 10
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = EstateProv_Unrest_Inp
										value = 25.6
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = EstateProv_Unrest_Inp
									value = 25.6
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = EstateProv_UnrestGain_25.6

							else_if = {

	id = random_event.14
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME14"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC14"
	picture = THEATRE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		capital_scope = {
			continent = europe
		}
		religion_group = christian
		has_idea_group = innovativeness_ideas
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA14"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_adm_power = 20
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB14"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_prestige = 5
		define_advisor = {
			female = yes
			skill = 1
			type = artist
			discount = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "personality_options.random.14.a"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ruler_has_personality = free_thinker_personality
		}
		required_personality = free_thinker_personality
		add_dip_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = random_event.20
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME20"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC20"
	picture = COURT_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ENG_had_event_XXX
		}
		is_year = 1600
		NOT = {
			is_year = 1800
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = ENG
				NOT = {
					exists = GBR
				}
			}
			tag = GBR
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				is_subject = no
				is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
			}
		}
		government = monarchy
		any_known_country = {
			tag = IRO
			ai = yes
			AND = {
				OR = {
					is_subject = no
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
				}
			}
			num_of_cities = 4
			NOT = {
				alliance_with = ROOT
				war_with = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = ENG_had_event_XXX
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA20"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		add_opinion = {
			who = IRO
			modifier = visit_of_the_four_kings
		}
		IRO = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = visit_of_the_four_kings
			}
		}
		create_alliance = IRO
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB20"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		add_treasury = -250
		IRO = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_grateful
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTC20"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		IRO = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_angry
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = random_event.21
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME21"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC21"
	picture = BIG_BOOK_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		owner = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = bible_translated
			}
			OR = {
				religion = catholic
				religion = protestant
				religion = reformed
			}
		}
		is_religion_enabled = protestant
		is_reformation_center = no
		religion_group = christian
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5000
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			province_id = 59
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		owner = {
			set_country_flag = bible_translated
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA21"
		owner = {
			PAP = {
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_grateful
				}
			}
			every_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_grateful
				}
			}
			every_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = protestant
						religion = reformed
					}
				}
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_angry
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB21"
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
					}
				}
			}
			change_religion = protestant
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					religion = reformed
				}
			}
			change_religion = reformed
		}
		owner = {
			PAP = {
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_angry
				}
			}
			every_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_irritated
				}
			}
			every_neighbor_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = protestant
						religion = reformed
					}
				}
				add_opinion = {
					who = ROOT
					modifier = opinion_grateful
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB22"
		owner = {
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = random_event.23
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME23"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC23"
	picture = PLAGUE_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		has_port = yes
		is_capital = no
		OR = {
			NOT = {
				has_province_flag = province_had_influenza
			}
			had_province_flag = {
				flag = province_had_influenza
				days = 10950
			}
		}
		owner = {
			primitives = no
			any_known_country = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = {
							continent = north_america
						}
						capital_scope = {
							continent = south_america
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_mtth_scaled_to_size = 1
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 600
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			has_terrain = marsh
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		set_province_flag = province_had_influenza
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA23"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		owner = {
			add_adm_power = -50
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = "quarantined_influenza"
			duration = 1440
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB23"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				calc_true_if = {
					all_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						development = 12
					}
					amount = 3
				}
			}
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = "influenza"
			duration = 720
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = quarantined_influenza
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = influenza
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = province_had_influenza
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = random_events.23.b.tt
		}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = random_event.24
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME24"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC24"
	picture = PLAGUE_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		development = 8
		any_neighbor_province = {
			has_province_modifier = influenza
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = {
				has_province_flag = province_had_influenza
			}
			had_province_flag = {
				flag = province_had_influenza
				days = 10950
			}
		}
		owner = {
			primitives = no
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 80
	}
	immediate = {
		set_province_flag = province_had_influenza
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA24"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = "quarantined_influenza"
			duration = 1440
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_owned_province = {
						has_province_modifier = influenza
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = influenza
					}
					remove_province_modifier = influenza
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = "quarantined_influenza"
						duration = 1440
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB24"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				calc_true_if = {
					all_neighbor_province = {
						owned_by = ROOT
						development = 12
					}
					amount = 3
				}
			}
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = "influenza"
			duration = 720
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_province = {
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = quarantined_influenza
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_modifier = influenza
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = province_had_influenza
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = random_events.23.b.tt
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = random_event.25
	title = "random_event.EVTNAME25"
	desc = "random_event.EVTDESC25"
	picture = RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		is_year = 1500
		NOT = {
			is_year = 1600
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = iconoclastic_fury
		}
		religion_group = christian
		is_religion_enabled = protestant
		capital_scope = {
			continent = europe
		}
		any_owned_province = {
			continent = europe
			religion = catholic
		}
		any_owned_province = {
			continent = europe
			is_reformation_center = no
			OR = {
				religion = protestant
				religion = reformed
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2000
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			OR = {
				primary_culture = dutch
				culture_group = langue_d_oil
				culture_group = langue_d_oc
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = iconoclastic_fury
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTA25"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_prestige = 5
		PAP = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = "stopped_iconoclastic_fury"
			}
		}
		add_mil_power = -50
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				continent = europe
				OR = {
					religion = protestant
					religion = reformed
				}
			}
			add_unrest = 10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTB25"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_prestige = -25
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = "iconoclastic_fury"
			duration = 3650
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "random_event.EVTOPTC25"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = PAP
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				religion = catholic
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			30 = {}
			40 = {
				custom_tooltip = stability_points_lost_50
				hidden_effect = {
					subtract_variable = {
						which = stability_points
						value = 50
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = stability_points
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						add_stability = -1
						country_event = {
							id = POP_Stability.003
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_emperor_of_china = yes
							}
							add_mandate = -5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			30 = {
				add_stability = -1
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = POP_Stability.003
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		PAP = {
			add_opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = "allowed_iconoclastic_fury"
			}
		}
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				continent = europe
				religion = catholic
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							religion = protestant
							religion = catholic
						}
					}
					is_reformation_center = no
				}
				change_religion = protestant
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						religion = reformed
					}
					is_reformation_center = no
				}
				change_religion = reformed
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = random_event.5037
	title = "EVTNAME5037"
	desc = "EVTDESC5037"
	picture = FARMING_eventPicture
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			wheat = 1
			rice = 1
			millet = 1
			maize = 1
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA5037"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
		}
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						trade_goods = wheat
						trade_goods = rice
						trade_goods = millet
						trade_goods = maize
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = military_development_efforts
				}
				extend_province_modifier = {
					name = military_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = military_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB5037"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						trade_goods = wheat
						trade_goods = rice
						trade_goods = millet
						trade_goods = maize
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = rural_development_efforts
				}
				extend_province_modifier = {
					name = rural_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = rural_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC5037"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						trade_goods = wheat
						trade_goods = rice
						trade_goods = millet
						trade_goods = maize
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = urban_development_efforts
				}
				extend_province_modifier = {
					name = urban_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
				}
			}

					name = urban_development_efforts
					duration = 3625
